data.en: Programming is the art of algorithm design and the craft of debugging errant code.
data.author: Ellen Ullman

data.en: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.
data.author: Rick Cook

data.en: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
data.author: Martin Fowler

data.en: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.en: Programming is the art of telling another human being what one wants the computer to do.
data.author: Donald Ervin Knuth

data.en: Quality is a product of a conflict between programmers and testers.
data.author: Yegor Bugayenk

data.en: Everybody should learn to program a computer because it teaches you how to think.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.en: I taught myself how to program computers when I was a kid, bought my first computer when I was 10, and sold my first commercial program when I was 12.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.en: Software and cathedrals are much the same â€” first we build them, then we pray.
data.author: Anonymous

data.en: Web development is difficult, only then it is fun to do. You just have to set your standards. If it were to be easy, would anyone do it?
data.author: Olawale Daniel

data.en: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
data.author: Linus Torvalds

data.en: Programmer: A machine that turns coffee into code.
data.author: Anonymous
